entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a young wizard who is being carried by Mrs. Figg.

entities.name: mrs figg
entities.description: A Squib who was tasked with keeping an eye on Harry but not telling him about his status.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, whose orders Mrs. Figg followed.

entities.name: mundungus
entities.description: A wizard who was supposed to be on duty until midnight but left unexpectedly.

relationships.description: Mrs. Figg is carrying Harry on her shoulder.
Dumbledore was supposed to be in charge of Mundungus's duties.
Harry is concerned about Mrs. Figg's situation and offers her his owl.
Dumbledore will be affected by Mundungus's absence.
